item.title: The Dangers Behind OAuth
item.description: Here's how to handle authentication in your next app.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Tentacles. Nice to meet you. I like writing. I like programming. I like privacy. This blog is a totally new project, so I’m interested to see what it brings. In time, I’ll most likely cross-post these posts on platforms such as Medium and dev.to. I’m on GitHub, too. Please only contact me in an emergency. My trust in people has withered.
